(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (ADJP (RB very) (JJ new)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (JJ Korean) (NN food)))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(new-4, I-1)
cop(new-4, am-2)
advmod(new-4, very-3)
root(ROOT-0, new-4)
prep(new-4, to-5)
amod(food-7, Korean-6)
pobj(to-5, food-7)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (CC but)
      (NP (NN fortunately)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, but-1)
dep(but-1, fortunately-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ my) (NN makan))
    (VP (VBZ kaki))
    (, ,)))


poss(makan-2, my-1)
nsubj(kaki-3, makan-2)
root(ROOT-0, kaki-3)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Cactuskit) (NNP ,)))


nn(,-2, Cactuskit-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT a) (JJ big) (NN fan)))
    (. .)))


cop(fan-4, is-1)
det(fan-4, a-2)
amod(fan-4, big-3)
root(ROOT-0, fan-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP He))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN fan))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (JJ Korean) (NN food))))
        (SBAR (IN since)
          (S
            (S
              (NP
                (NP (PRP he))
                (CC and)
                (NP (PRP$ his) (NN wife)))
              (VP (VBD were)
                (ADVP (RB still))
                (VP (VBG dating)
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (NNP Hawaii))))))
            (CC and)
            (S
              (NP (PRP he))
              (VP (VBZ has)
                (VP (VBN eaten)
                  (PP (IN at)
                    (NP
                      (NP (JJ many) (NNS restaurants))
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP (NNP Hawaii))))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(fan-5, He-1)
aux(fan-5, has-2)
cop(fan-5, been-3)
det(fan-5, a-4)
root(ROOT-0, fan-5)
prep(fan-5, of-6)
amod(food-8, Korean-7)
pobj(of-6, food-8)
mark(dating-16, since-9)
nsubj(dating-16, he-10)
cc(he-10, and-11)
poss(wife-13, his-12)
conj(he-10, wife-13)
aux(dating-16, were-14)
advmod(dating-16, still-15)
advcl(fan-5, dating-16)
prep(dating-16, in-17)
pobj(in-17, Hawaii-18)
cc(dating-16, and-19)
nsubj(eaten-22, he-20)
aux(eaten-22, has-21)
conj(dating-16, eaten-22)
prep(eaten-22, at-23)
amod(restaurants-25, many-24)
pobj(at-23, restaurants-25)
prep(restaurants-25, in-26)
pobj(in-26, Hawaii-27)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Korea))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Korea-1)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB as) (RB well) (RB as))
    (NP (NNP Singapore))
    (. .)))


advmod(as-3, as-1)
advmod(as-3, well-2)
dep(Singapore-4, as-3)
root(ROOT-0, Singapore-4)


(ROOT
  (S (IN So)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP depend)
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP (PRP him)))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB give)
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (JJR more) (JJ balanced) (NN review))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (JJ Korean) (NN food))))))))
    (. .)))


dep(depend-3, So-1)
nsubj(depend-3, I-2)
root(ROOT-0, depend-3)
prep(depend-3, on-4)
pobj(on-4, him-5)
aux(give-7, to-6)
xcomp(depend-3, give-7)
det(review-11, a-8)
amod(review-11, more-9)
amod(review-11, balanced-10)
dobj(give-7, review-11)
prep(review-11, of-12)
amod(food-14, Korean-13)
pobj(of-12, food-14)
